info.title: BaaS - Transfer
info.description:
Api responsible for soliciting transfers between bank accounts (TED/TEF) Transfer Status
Status Description Final Status Notification Event Type
CREATED Created Transfer transfer_created
CONFIRMING Transfer begin verified with the client if it was requested by him
CONFIRMED Transfer confirmed by the client transfer_confirmed
NOT_CONFIRMED Transfer denied by the client Yes transfer_not_confirmed
PROCESSING Sending transfer to the integrator
PROCESSED Transfer sent to the integrator
REJECTED Transfer with missing or invalid data Yes transfer_rejected
ERROR Failure to process transfer Yes transfer_error
DONE Transfer confirmed by the integrator Yes transfer_done

Status Change Notification

As described in the status table, some statuses will fire a notification call to the owner of the transfer. To receive this notifications, its necessary to request the registration of the service URL which will receive the notification object. This object will be sent as an HTTP call with the POST method, of which the client must respond with a 200 status and within 5 seconds. Notification Call Scheme Headers: ```json { X-R4-Application: GUID // Application Unique Identifier X-R4-Delivery: GUID // Attempt Unique Identifier X-R4-Event: {event_type} // Event Type for the Notification (As describe in the Transfer Status Table) User-Agent: R4-Hookshot } ``` Body ```json { "object_kind": "{event_type}", //Event Type for the Notification (As describe in the Transfer Status Table) "object_id": "GUID", // Transfer Unique Identifier "application_id": "GUID", // Application Unique Identifier "account_id": "GUID" // Account Unique Identifier } ```

Debit Confirmation

To receive the confirmation, its necessary the previous registration of the client url. This object will be sent as an HTTP call with the POST method, of which the client must respond with a 202 status and within 10 seconds. Debit Confirmation Call Scheme Headers: ```json { X-R4-Application: GUID // Application Unique Identifier X-R4-Delivery: GUID // Attempt Unique Identifier X-R4-Event: "transfer_debit_confirmation" // Event Type for the Notification User-Agent: R4-Hookshot } ``` Body ```json { "object_kind": "transfer_debit_confirmation", //Event Type for the Notification (As describe in the Transfer Status Table) "object_id": "GUID", // Transfer Unique Identifier "application_id": "GUID", // Application Unique Identifier "account_id": "GUID" // Account Unique Identifier "metadata": { // Transfer notification metadata "id": "GUID" // Transfer metadata unique identifier, "value": number // Transfer notification value, "goal": 10 // Goal code for the transfer, "sender": { "name": string // Transfer sender Name, "bank_code": number // Bank Code, "agency": number // Bank agency, "account": number // Account number, "account_digit": number // Account digit, "account_type": "CHECKING_ACCOUNT" | "SAVINGS_ACCOUNT" // Account type enum "document_type": "CNPJ" | "CPF" // Document type, "document_number": number // Document number }, "recipient": { "name": string // Transfer recipient name "bank_code": number, // Bank code "agency": number, // Bank agency "account": number, // Account number "account_digit": number, // Account digit "account_type": "CHECKING_ACCOUNT" | "SAVINGS_ACCOUNT" // Account type enum "document_type": "CNPJ" | "CPF" // Document type, "document_number": number // Document number } } } ```

post.description: Request for transfer from a baas account to an external bank account

id.description:
Transfer Unique Identifier
Must be sent by the client as an Global Unique Identifier (http://guid.one/guid) as it will be used as identification for the transfer in all other routes

account_type.description: Account Type - `CHECKING_ACCOUNT`: Checking Account Type - `SAVINGS_ACCOUNT`: Savings Account Type

document_type.description:
Document Type
- `CPF`: Individual Taxpayer's Registry - `CNPJ`: Corporate Taxpayer's Registry

document_number.description: Document number with only its numbers

initiation_channel.description: The property indicates the transfer initiation channel

open_banking.description: Indicates that the transfer was initiated in the Open Banking
